snippet.title: Nine Witches Family Disruption - Coming Soon!
snippet.description:
Nine Witches – Family Disruption is a 2D pixel art action-adventure game that takes place during World War II. 

Professor Alexei Krakovitz,  who can commune with the dead, and his Japanese assistant Akiro work for a secret paranormal investigation unit, and the two are sent undercover to resolve the supernatural phenomena occurring in the rural Norse town of Sundäe.

Control both characters throughout the game, switching at will, players will not only get to explore the village but also experience the Astral Plane, the nexus between the earthly world and the hereafter.

The game offers well-known adventure game mechanics, and it is focused on the craziness of the puzzles and the story. The whole game is bizarre and full of surprises. Over the entire adventure, the player will meet a lot of characters, including evil Nazis, dumb aliens from the moon, and creatures from the darkness.

Coming to PlayStation 4, Nintendo Switch, Steam, and Xbox One!

---
